(the five bots in this post are the Maximals that had crashed earlier :)

The five had met up and regrouped, and now they were building a scanner from 
the material that they had with them. The material was mostly scrap from the 
pods that they had landed in, though some of it was functional. Two of the 
robots stood guard while the others worked carefully.

Several minutes passed before one of the robots jumped up with a triumphant 
cry. "It works!"

The others turned to him and looked at the device, which was now showing a 
battle to the southeast. The biggest bot in the group smiled. "Good job, 
Rixer," he said to the other. Rixer smiled. He was the mechanic of the 
group, and could fix almost anything. The rest of the team consisted of 
Blyer, who was the areal fighter, Trattle, who transported the group around, 
Forrior, who was the ground fighter, and Cledar, the commander of the group 
and the bot that had just spoken to Rixer. The five watched the scanners for 
a while, and then it was decided to go investigate the battle. The scanners 
couldn't report who was fighting, so they would have to see for themselves.

"Ok, let's go," Cledar said and looked to Trattle. The transporter 
transformed into a large shuttle, and Cledar, Rixer, and Forrior climed in. 
Trattle took off and Blyer followed him in his jet mode. The five bots 
headed for the battle they had picked up, the large Maximal symbols plainly 
visible on the shuttle and the jet.
